db:abstract.db:para: A widget-based application that sends data to and receives it from a compiled ECMAScript data model.

db:article.db:para: Media Player Example (Static) demonstrates how to access data from an ECMAScript data model that is compiled into a C++ class.
The UI is created using Qt Widgets.

db:section.db:title: Running the Example
db:section.db:para: To run the example from Qt Creator, open the Welcome mode and select the example from Examples. For more information, visit Building and Running an Example.
